docs.text: Serializer Inference pip install drf-serializer-inference Documentation : https://mrthearman.github.io/drf-serializer-inference/ Source Code : https://github.com/MrThearMan/drf-serializer-inference/ Contributing : https://github.com/MrThearMan/drf-serializer-inference/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md Infer Django Rest Framework serializers from callables like functions and classes.
